secondaries.missionName: Bathe your blade in the blood of the foe
secondaries.shortDescription: Select 1 BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model from your army, 1 CHARACTER model from your opponent's army. 5 points if : enemy target destroyed + 5 if also destroyed thanks to a melee and + 5 if it was from your targeted model

subObjectives.description: Enemy model has been destroyed by a melee attack
